response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business operations. This product, valued at $1,200,000 to us, offers unparalleled capabilities and benefits that align with your strategic goals. Considering its exceptional quality and potential impact on your organization, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. We understand that the value of this product may be subjective based on your specific needs and objectives, but we are confident that our proposal represents a compelling opportunity for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1100000}
